database_maintenance_crew.name: Database Maintenance Crew
database_maintenance_crew.dialogue: What how did you get in here? Oh your that white hat hacker we hired? Make sure you do these security patches pronto!

the_middle_man.name: Middle Man
the_middle_man.dialogue: Don't mind me you go on right ahead

random_script_kiddie.name: Random Script Kiddie
random_script_kiddie.dialogue: teach me how to be better at hacking! I'll give this item to you as payment for your services!

Server Security.name: Server Security
Server Security.dialogue: Sorry kid, but I gotta kick you from the system, admin's orders don't take it personally

Angry_forum_crowd.name: Angry Forum Crowd
Angry_forum_crowd.dialogue: You tried talking to the crowd but instead received lots of abusive language

frustrated_hacker.name: Frustrated Hacker
frustrated_hacker.dialogue: you seem aggrieved... ah don't let them get to you, here take this anti-virus module, you'll need it on your journey

API Salesperson.name: API Salesperson
API Salesperson.dialogue: Ah just the person I was looking for! Here take this thing, nobody seems to want it, so I'll give it to you for free

Bitcoin Miner Adam.name: Bitcoin Miner Adam
Bitcoin Miner Adam.dialogue: All this mining is hard work eh? I found this packet of data but I have no use for it
